book.synopsis: The classic chronicle of a communion with nature at Walden Pond offers a message of living simply and in harmony with nature, and Thoreau champions the belief that people of conscience are at liberty to follow their own opinions.
book.title_long: Walden and Resistance to Civil Government (Norton Critical Editions)
